document.docAuthor: Pérez-Benavides, A. Lucía, Hernández-Baz, Fernando, González, Jorge M. & Riverón, Alejandro Zaldívar
document.masterDocTitle: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts.
Acanthoscelides aureolus (Horn)
complex on
Astragalus praelongus var. lonchopus Barneby
;
Acanthoscelides chiricahuae (Fall)
( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ; Kingsolver 2004 )* on
Mimosa
nr
laxiflora Benth.
,
Mimosa aculeaticarpa Ortega
,
Mimosa brandegei B.L. Rob.
, and
Mimosa dysocarpa Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides clitellarius (Fahraeus)
on
Piptadenia flava
(DC.) Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides cordifer (Sharp)
on
Mimosa albida Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides derifieldi johnson
on
Desmanthus covillei (Britton & Rose) B.L.Turner
, and
Desmanthus subulatus (Britton & Rose) Wiggins ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides desmanthi Johnson
on
Desmanthus covillei (Britton & Rose) B.L.Turner ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides difficilis (Sharp)
on
Mimosa albida Willd.
, and
Mimosa pigra
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides johnsoni Kingsolver
on
Triumfetta lappula
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides mimosicola Johnson
on
Mimosa albida Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides mixtus ( Horn)
( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ; Kingsolver 2004 )* on
Astragalus thurberi A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides obrienorum Johnson ( Kingsolver 2004 )
* on
Senna pallida (Vahl) H.S.Irwin & Barneby
,
Senna wislizeni (A.Gray) H.S.Irwin & Barneby
,
Senna pallida (Vahl) H.S.Irwin & Barneby
, and
Senna skinneri (Benth.) H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides pallidipennis (Motschulsky)
on
Amorpha fruticosa
L. (
Tuda et al. 2001
);
Acanthoscelides piceoapicalis (Pic)
on
Mimosa pudica
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides pigricola Kingsolver
on
Mimosa pigra
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides pullus (Fall)
on
Astragalus trichopodus (Torr. & A.Gray) A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides quadridentatus (Schaeffer)
( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ; Kingsolver 2004 )* on
Mimosa pigra
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides schrankiae (Horn)
on
Mimosa polyantha Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides speciosus (Schaeffer)
on
Mimosa
nr
laxiflora Benth.
,
Mimosa aculeaticarpa Ortega
,
Mimosa brandegei B.L. Rob.
,
Mimosa laxiflora Benth.
,
Mimosa palmeri Rose
, and
Mimosa polyantha Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;

on
Abutilon incanum (Link) Swee ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides zeteki Kingsolver
on
Rhynchosia minima
(L.) DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Bruchidius
sp. ( Herting 1973 ) on
Desmodium
sp. (
Tuda et al. 2001
)*;
Bruchus tristiculus Fahraeus ( Herting 1973 )
;
Callosobruchus maculatus (Fabricius) ( Alebeek 1994 )
;
Gibbobruchus
sp. on
Bauhinia ungulata
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Merobruchus insolitus (Sharp)
on
Hesperalbizia occidentalis (Brandegee) Barneby & J.W.Grime
, and
Lysiloma divaricatum (Jacq.) J.F.Macbr. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Merobruchus terani Kingsolver
on
Acacia tenuifolia
(L.) (
Maia et al 2018
)*;
Mimosestes acaciestes Kingsolver & Johnson
( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ; Kingsolver 2004 )* on
Acacia constricta A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Mimosestes amicus (Horn)
on
Acacia constricta A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius
sp. on
Senna wislizeni (A.Gray) H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius atripectus Johnson & Kingsolver
on
Senna pallida (Vahl) H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius discolor (Horn)
on
Senna pallida (Vahl) H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius lebasi (Fahraeus)
on
Senna hirsuta var. hirta H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;

on
Senna hirsuta var. hirta H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius rufomaculatus (Motschulsky)
on
Senna hirsuta var. hirta H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;

on
Acacia angustissima ( Mill.) Kuntze
,
Acacia macmurphyi Wiggins
, and
Lysiloma divaricatum (Jacq.) J.F.Macbr. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Stator maculatopygus (Pic)
on
Acacia tenuifolia
(L.) Willd. (
Tuller et al. 2015
;
Maia et al. 2018
)*;
Stator pruininus (Horn)
on
Acacia constricta A.Gray
,
Desmanthus covillei (Britton & Rose) B.L.Turner
,
Desmanthus fruticosus Rose
,
Desmanthus subulatus (Britton & Rose) Wiggins
,
Mimosa laxiflora Benth.
,
Mimosa palmeri Rose
, and
Mimosa polyantha Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*.

Distribution. AFROTROPICAL: Botswana , Burkina Faso , Kenya , Namibia , Niger , Nigeria , Senegal , South Africa , Tanzania , Uganda . AUSTRALASIAN: Australia . INDO-AUSTRALIAN: Fiji , Indonesia , Malaysia , Philippines , United States of America ( Hawaii ). NEARCTIC: Canada , United States of America . NEOTROPICAL: Brazil , Cuba , Guatemala * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ), Haiti , Honduras * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ), Mexico , Panama * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ), Peru , Trinidad & Tobago . ORIENTAL: India , Pakistan . PALEARCTIC: Armenia , Czechoslovakia , Egypt , Ethiopia , France , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Israel , Italy , Japan , Libya , Morocco , Peoples’ Republic of China , Romania , Russia , South Korea , Spain ( Canary Islands ), Switzerland , United Kingdom , USSR.
